parameter.value: Ah, a visitor. Greetings |PLAYERNAME|!
I am the Chief Huntsman of Thais.
I am Robin. Some call me Rob, others Woody.
Time... it's running that fast when you are as old as me.
I am his Master of the Hunt as I was his father's Master of the Hunt.
I am his Master of the Hunt as I was his father's Master of the Hunt.
My buddy Quentin is getting old, too. Things were different in our youth.
So young and so beautiful! She makes even an old man as me... uhm... feel a bit younger again.
Another one of a few friends of my youth who's still left.
These kids call themselves an army... In the old times we had a REAL army, I tell ya...
These kids call themselves an army... In the old times we had a REAL army, I tell ya...
A misguided follower of evil.
I have not much use for heavy armor.
Sells a lot of useful stuff that guy. I rember the days when we were so poor that we could not afford anything the former owner offered.
Ah, I love that hut. I liked it as it was Iwan's hut, I loved it as it was Pridence's hut, and I think I will never stop to love this place.
A master, or better mistress, of the bow. But with her big feet she just chases all game away.
These mages still give me shivers. I remember the first time this Ferumbras guy showed his ugly face here.
These mages still give me shivers. I remember the first time this Ferumbras guy showed his ugly face here.
Can you imagine this youngster handles a guild? Ah, come on.
Druids have their ways with nature, but they would rather cuddle a bear than hunting it.
Druids have their ways with nature, but they would rather cuddle a bear than hunting it.
Such guys don't live long. The grandfather of our king had a new jester every season.
I hardly know him.
Oh, what a charming young man. He's often here asking me about my youth and the people I met in my life.
The farmers are fine fellows.
The farmers are fine fellows.
The farmers are fine fellows.
Crunor gives and takes. That is his way. As long as we don't hunt more then we need we are at balance with Crunor.
Can you imagine his father was such a fine guy? A shame what his son has become.
I don't like swords in general.
News? In the woods I learn nothing of importance to the world.
